Package Heroes_Villains.graphics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Handles the frames show for animated objects.
    Assets
    Loads all of the assests for the game, fonts, images, and image arrays.
    DrawText
    Draws a string to the graphics object at a specified position, colour and font.
    FontLoader
    Loads the fonts into the game to be used as assests.
    ImageHandler
    Loads images to be assigned in Assets.
    SpriteSheet
    Allows the loading of sprite sheets and the cropping of images from them.
